info.description: API specification for Assembly's SPICE (Simple Payments Interface - Classic Edition).
info.title: Assembly Payments Adaptor API

get.description: Retrieve a purchase transaction from the last 10 processed transactions
Retrieve a MOTO transaction from the last 10 processed transactions

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The posRefId of the MOTO transaction

200.description: Successfully retrieved the specified MOTO transaction

get.description: Retrieve a refund transaction from the last 10 processed transactions

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Retreiving refund transaction based on PosRefId

200.description: Successfully retrieved the specified refund transaction
Successfully retrieved the specified refund transaction

POS-NAME.description: Name of your Point of Sales

POS-VERSION.description: Version of your Point of Sales

purchaseAmount.description: Total amount of the transaction that was performed to the bank in cents

tipAmount.description: Tip component of a transaction in cents. Note, Tip amount and cash out amount cannot be used together.

cashoutAmount.description: Amount to cashout in cents. Tip amount and cash out amount cannot be used together.

surchargeAmount.description: Surcharge amount in cents to include in the transaction.

promptForCashout.description: If set to true, the terminal will prompt for cash out, default is false.

posRefId.description: Transaction to retrieve based on posRefId

refundAmount.description: Total amount of the transaction that was performed to the bank in cents

suppressMerchantPassword.description: If true, merchant password will not be prompted during the refund

posRefId.description: Refund transaction to retrieve based on posRefId

purchaseAmount.description: Total amount of the transaction that was performed to the bank in cents

surchargeAmount.description: Surcharge amount in cents to include in the transaction.

suppressMerchantPassword.description: If true, merchant password will not be prompted during the MOTO transaction

posRefId.description: MOTO Transaction to retrieve based on posRefId

bank_noncash_amount.description: Total amount of the transaction that was performed to the bank in cents

customer_receipt.example:
EFTPOS FROM WESTPAC
AP TEST MID VX690
BUSNESS BANKING
SYDNEY 2000
Australia

TIME 26MAR19   13:55
MID         25758970
TSP     100381000315
RRN     190326000302
MasterCard      
Mastercard(C)     CR
CARD............4791
AID   A0000000041010
TVR       0000008000
AUTH          915304

PURCHASE    AUD20.00

   (000) APPROVED

  *CUSTOMER COPY*

customer_receipt_printed.description: If a customer receipt has been printed

host_response_code.description: Response code returned by the host

host_response_text.description: Response text returned by the host

merchant_receipt_printed.description: If a merchant receipt has been printed

pos_ref_id.description: Unique alphanumeric identifier corresponding to the request

purchase_amount.description: Purchase amount corresponding to the request

tip_amount.description: Tip amount corresponding to the request

amount_purchase.description: Purchase amount to be refunded in cents

customer_receipt.example:
EFTPOS FROM BANK SA
TEST Term M2
275 Kent St
Sydney 2000
Australia


MID         20150726
TSP     100612345884
TIME 08SEP17   12:23
RRN     1517890857
TRAN 000005   CREDIT
Mastercard         I
CARD............5182
AUTH          201633

REFUND      AUD1000

TOTAL       AUD1000


   (000) APPROVED


  \*CUSTOMER COPY\*

merchant_receipt.example:
EFTPOS FROM WESTPAC
VAAS Product 3
275 Kent St
Sydney 2000

Australia


  PREVIOUS TOTALS
TSP     100381990117
TIME 05OCT17  16:03
TRAN 000000-000000
FROM 04OCT17 05:00
TO   05OCT17 05:00

Debit
TOT     0      $0.00

MasterCard
TOT     0      $0.00

Visa
TOT     0      $0.00

BANKED  0      $0.00

Amex
TOT     0      $0.00

Diners
TOT     0      $0.00

JCB
TOT     0      $0.00

UnionPay
TOT     0      $0.00

TOTAL
TOT     0      $0.00

   (000) APPROVED
